General.Name: Ama Marine Public Company Limited
General.Description: Ama Marine Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the marine transportation business in Thailand, Southeast Asia regions, China, and India. The company operates in two segments: Marine Transportation and Logistics Services. It owns and operates a fleet of 9 tankers that has a total capacity of 86,531 DWT to transport palm oil, vegetable oil, and other chemicals. The company also transports petrol, bio diesel, and vegetable oil through operating 253 trucks and semi-trailers. Ama Marine Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 33/4 The 9th Towers, Tower A, Bangkok, Thailand, 10310
